a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Countries that are long-standing electoral democracies, World
Political regimes based on the classification by Lührmann et al. (2018) and the estimates by V-Dem’s experts.
Electoral democracies are understood here as political systems that hold meaningful, free and fair, and multi-party
Note: The share of closed autocracies increases a lot in 1900 because V-Dem covers many more countries since then, often colonies.
